english.segment1: i surrender all. to the promises you made. and i will give it all. to the maker of the day
english.segment2: no one knows your heart. and no one knows your fears. when no one solves the mysteries. or even wipes away the tears
english.segment3: can you hear the sound of laughter. from the other side of life?. there are days when i feel like a stranger sometimes. tell me, are there any other fools like me?
english.segment4: this reliance on another world. has a great effect on this world. this conscience of another world. has a great effect on. grace recollection
english.segment5: he doesn't love us 'cause of who we are. he only loves us 'cause of who he is
english.segment6: we all were children once. so will we return. so let those days return. let us all return Â….
